body: I cannot, in this current form my thetan inhabits, presume that this has come into existence. I have needed this for my education  and one of the pillars of civilisation publicly acknowledged to be an institute of education known in simple mundane language as a university. I, the being from the Genus and species Homo Sapiens, have used a device of technological advancement created by a set of diverse and varied cultures to recreate a combination of strings of symbols and connected lines in the scheme and structure of this art form known as hentai, categorically distinctively indicatively clearly correctly definitely respectively and especially this one. With the help of millions of light waves/particles, I have been transmitting the visual information encoded in the replica of the illustration shown above. I decided to do this when a Homo sapiens male acquaintance of mine shared that he was a fanatic of the television series that came into creation in the eastern country of The Land of
